dc_title_s: Scarborough's map of Minnesota : showing counties, townships, railroads, cities, towns, villages, post-offices, and stations ...
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:823,680]. 13 mi. to 1 in. (W 97°30'--W 89° 30'/N 49°30'--N 43°15'). Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:6,000,000 (W 125°--W 67°/N 50°--N 20°). Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Includes index for Minnesota counties and cities with 1905 state census populations, Minnesota distance table, inset map of Minneapolis and St. Paul, United States distance table with railroad fares, 1900 United States census table and charts, two inset hemisphere maps of the world, insets of Alaska and Europe, 8 ancillary maps of U.S. products, and ill.|95 x 99 centimeters|1:823,680|1:6,000,000|General Minnesota Maps
